Item.label: Show switch/dimmer state / when in motion or inactive (for blinds)
Show if not closed (for blinds only)

Value.label: Automatically switch off after
Value.Help: If not zero, automatically switch off/close blind after a user defined time

Value.label: What to do on RF off command
Value.Help: If not zero, automatically switch off/close blind after a user defined time

Item.label: Switch on if load is off else switch off

Value.label: Ignore Start Level
Value.Help: Defines if the dimmer shall ignore start level in StartLevelChange command despite it is specified or not.

Value.label: Restore switch state after power cycle
Value.Help: Defines if the switch should restore switch state to the last state prior to device power off (power cycle).

Value.label: Typical click timeout
Value.Help: Typical time used to differentiate click, hold, double and triple clicks.

Value.label: Switch by buttons
Value.Help: If disabled, the local operations by buttons will not switch the load, but only send commands to On/Off association group. In this mode buttons are not linked with the switch anymore. They can be used separately: buttons to control remote device, switch will operate by RF commands only.

Value.label: Action on button single press or hold
Value.Help: Defines which command should be sent on button single press or hold. Basic commands are sent to Association group. Switch All commands are sent broadcast.

Item.label: Switch On/Off and Dim (send Basic Set and Switch Multilevel) (Default)
Switch On, Off and dim using Basic Set

Value.label: Action on button double press or hold
Value.Help: Defines which command should be sent on button double press or press-hold. Basic commands are sent to Association group. Switch All commands are sent broadcast. If not disabled, the device will wait for a click timeout to see if the second click would be pressed. This will introduce a small delay for single click commands.

Item.label: Switch On/Off and Dim (send Basic Set and Switch Multilevel)
Switch On, Off and dim using Basic Set

Value.label: Send the following Switch All commands
What to do on button Down press

Group.label: Group 1 Single press and hold of up/down buttons
Group 2 Double press and press-hold of up/down buttons
Group 3 Send Reports on switch state change
